titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: TUMOUR INVASION INDICATOR (PERINEPHRIC FAT) - Description

div.p: TUMOUR INVASION INDICATOR (PERINEPHRIC FAT) is the same as attribute TUMOUR INVASION INDICATOR FOR KIDNEY, to indicate if the Tumour has invaded the perinephric fat (the structure between the renal fascia and renal capsule) during an Urological Cancer Care Spell.
